label: bounty
search: Search for a bounty by title, description or tags
description_proposal: Reviewed implementations by the network curators ready to be approved by the network curators.
description_deliverable: Raw implementations from the network developers ready to be reviewed by anyone and approved into proposals by the network curators

descriptions.select-network: Select the chain and network you want to create your bounty
descriptions.details: Enter the necessary information to understand your bounty
descriptions.github: Inform the repository and the branch where the solution will be made
descriptions.reward: When creating a new bounty, you have two options regarding the reward:
descriptions.reward-1: Self-fund: You use your own money to create the bounty. This means you will be responsible for providing the reward money that will be given to the person who successfully completes the task.
descriptions.reward-2: Seek funding: You can seek funding for the bounty. This means you can look for other individuals who are willing to contribute to the reward money.
descriptions.review: In this step you will view the main information and get a sense of how your bounty is doing

recognize-finished.title: Recognize as finished
recognize-finished.error: Failed to mark bounty as finished

start-working.title: Start Working
start-working.success: To start working on this bounty
start-working.error: To start working on this bounty

errors.sync: The bounty was created, but something went wrong while reading the blockchain, please go to the home page while we try to get your bounty
errors.description-limit: Exceeds allowed limit of characters and files: {{value}}
errors.no-networks-chain: The selected chain has no active networks
errors.banned-domain: This domain is banned and cannot be used to open bounties.
errors.invalid-link: Invalid link provided. Please check if the link has the protocol (http/https) or the link is correct.

title: Create new Bounty

deliverable-types.label: Deliverable Types

origin-link.label: Origin Link
origin-link.description: If you have a project boilerplate, a figma design, or something that might help people to work on this bounty, you can provide a link below.

reward-funders-description: Reward anyone who funds this bounty.
not-found-funding: Funding requests make the community itself fund ideas they would like for their applications
sub-title-bounties: A collection of the most recent bounties and MVP Networks on our ecosystem
edit-text: You are currently editing a bounty

kyc.tool-tip: Become mandatory do a KYC validation to participate on bounty.

set-funders-reward-description: Amount you want to pay for the funders as recompense for their participation
